Title: Machine Learning for Science

URL Source: https://ml4sci.org/

Markdown Content:
* * *

![Image 1: ML4SCI Logo](https://ml4sci.org/images/ml4sci_logo_angled.png)

Machine Learning for Science (ML4Sci) is an open-source organization that brings together modern machine learning techniques and applies them to cutting edge problems in Science, Technology, Engineering, and Math (STEM).

* * *

ML4SCI in GSoC 2025
-------------------

The ML4Sci open source organization plans to participate in the [2025 Google Summer of Code](https://summerofcode.withgoogle.com/). If you are a student interested in our [projects](https://ml4sci.org/activities/gsoc2025.html) please check our [ideas page](https://ml4sci.org/gsoc/2025/summary.html). ML4Sci is an umbrella organization that welcomes other projects and organizations related to machine-learning for science. Please contact the admins at [ml4-sci@cern.ch](mailto:ml4-sci@cern.ch) if you are interested in participating as a project. Our contributors publish [scientific articles in peer-reviewed journals](https://ml4sci.org/activities/papers.html).

![Image 2: GSoC-logo](https://ml4sci.org/images/GSoC/GSoC-icon-192.png)

Please take a look at our [GSoC Page](https://ml4sci.org/activities/gsoc2025.html) for more details.

If you are interested in AI in Humanities and Arts please visit our sister GSoC Organization [HumanAI](https://humanai.foundation/) planning to take part in GSoC 2025.

If you are interested in our activities please join our [announcements mailing list](https://simba3.web.cern.ch/simba3/SelfSubscription.aspx?groupName=ml4sci-announce). To join, you will need to create a [CERN lightweight account](https://account.cern.ch/account/externals/).

You can also find us on [Gitter](https://matrix.to/#/#ML4SCI_general:gitter.im).
